title: Alabama lumber mill faces $43,116 in fines for exposing workers to deadly safety hazards
text:
Published By: Al.com: Alabama Business - Today 
An Alabama lumber mill faces fines totaling $43,116 for continually exposing workers to potentially deadly workplace safety hazards that cou...
